content: use up all the little scraps of cotton yarn to make this fun **scrappy dots potholder** mix and match your leftover yarn into your own unique confetti color scheme the result will be a super colorful potholder that is fun to crochet and to actually use in the kitchen **materials** 3 0-mm c usa 11 uk hook dk 3 light weight cotton yarn tapestry needle **gauge** 1 scrappy dot mini square in 1 2 3 cm **size** 6 2 16 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni to see more of my projects and patterns visit me on facebook and instagram here www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 2 www facebook com/raffamusadesigns 3 1 https //raffamusadesigns com/scrap-stash-busting-free-crochet-patterns/ 2 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 3 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
